org.lightningj.paywall.annotations

Annotation Type PaymentRequired


  • @Documented
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface PaymentRequired
    Main annotation used on a WebService of WebPage controller or similar endpoint to indicate that payment is required to allow access.

    It contains a number of options:

    • articleId, determines the type of order that should be generated, used by PaymentHandler to determine order amount depending on article an units. (Required if not a custom OrderRequestGenerator is used).
    • units, The number of units for given article number, default is 1
    • payPerRequest, if payment is valid for one request only. (Usually for WebService Request)
    • orderRequestGenerator, possibility to specify a custom order request generator, instead of the default one using the articleId and units to request an order.
    • requestPolicy, defining what in HTTP request that is considered relevant for determining a unique payment.
    • customPolicy, if the redefined request policy types isn't applicable and a custom implementation is necessary.
    • paymentOptions, extra options that might be needed by PaymentHandler to generate an Order (first type in a payment flow).

    Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-09-07.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String articleId 
      java.lang.Class<? extends RequestPolicy> customPolicy 
      java.lang.Class<? extends OrderRequestGenerator> orderRequestGenerator 
      PaymentOption[] paymentOptions 
      boolean payPerRequest 
      RequestPolicyType requestPolicy 
      int units

      • articleId

        public abstract java.lang.String articleId
        Returns:
        determines the type of order that should be generated, used by PaymentHandler to determine order amount depending on article an units. (Required if not a custom OrderRequestGenerator is used).
        Default:
        ""

      • units

        public abstract int units
        Returns:
        The number of units for given article number, default is 1
        Default:
        1

      • payPerRequest

        public abstract boolean payPerRequest
        Returns:
        if payment is valid for one request only. (Usually for WebService Request)
        Default:
        false

      • orderRequestGenerator

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends OrderRequestGenerator> orderRequestGenerator
        Returns:
        possibility to specify a custom order request generator, instead of the default one using the articleId and units to request an order.
        See Also:
        OrderRequestGenerator
        Default:
        org.lightningj.paywall.orderrequestgenerator.DefaultOrderRequestGenerator.class

      • requestPolicy

        public abstract RequestPolicyType requestPolicy
        Returns:
        defining what in HTTP request that is considered relevant for determining a unique payment.
        See Also:
        RequestPolicyType
        Default:
        org.lightningj.paywall.requestpolicy.RequestPolicyType.WITH_BODY

      • customPolicy

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends RequestPolicy> customPolicy
        Returns:
        custom class if none of the predefined request policy types isn't applicable and a custom implementation is necessary.
        See Also:
        RequestPolicy
        Default:
        org.lightningj.paywall.requestpolicy.NoCustomRequestPolicy.class

      • paymentOptions

        public abstract PaymentOption[] paymentOptions
        Returns:
        extra options that might be needed by PaymentHandler to generate an Order (first type in a payment flow).
        See Also:

        Default:
        {}
